staxel.village.character.dialogue.ErisBe: (안함)Thanks again for helping out with getting me set up!
(안함)I don't think I could have convinced those Murmurs myself...
(안함)Have you bought anything from my store yet?
(안함)I think I have some styles that would suit you really well!
(안함)...not that there's anything wrong with what you're wearing now!
